bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, semi-compact race design, shaped TT, integrated headset, 1-1/2" lower bearing, internal cable routing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, 1-1/2" lower bearing, disc only
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated, w/ headset, 20mm cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Chainstay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
